 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַפִּרְיוֺן‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==sedan, litter, palanquin== (so Late Hebrew; origin dubious; no plausible Shemitic etymology; perhaps (so [[BDB#RS|RS]] in Yule<sup>Glossary of Anglo-Indian words, 502</sup>) Sanskrit <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***paryanka***</u></abbr>, ***litter-bed, 'palankeen;'*** perhaps (if poem be late) Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">φορεῖον</span>; — [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] has <span class="bdbLangGreek">φορεῖον</span>, [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***ferculum***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (and <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) PS<sup>3073</sup>; Sota 9:14 and Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַפִּרְיוֺן‎</span>, Talmud also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺרְיָא‎</span> and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺרְיוֺן‎</span>, Levy<sup>NHWB i.150, iv. 17.</sup>) [[Song.3.9|Song 3:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשָׂה לוֺ הֶמֶּלֶח שְׁלֹמֹה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span>.
